metadata.title: CVE-2021-3345 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.description: _gcry_md_block_write in cipher/hash-common.c in Libgcrypt version 1.9.0 hasa heap-based buffer overflow when the digest final function sets a largecount value. It is recommended to upgrade to 1.9.1 or later.

criterions.comment: libgcrypt20: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libgcrypt11: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
